questiontext.text: On a given hospital ward, over the course of a year, records are kept of how many men and how many women are lying on the first day of the month lie. The numbers for the number of women during that year were:______________. 10 13 12 9 9 11 12 12 10 14 12 10Â For these numbers:

answer.text: The median is greater than the mean

feedback.text: The median is greater than the mean: Correct

answer.text: The median and the mean are the same size

feedback.text: The median and the mean are the same size: Incorrect

answer.text: The median is smaller than the mean

feedback.text: The median is smaller than the mean: Incorrect

answer.text: Median and mean are not comparable here

feedback.text: Median and mean are not comparable here: Incorrect
